hic incipit dies iudicii et Ihesu descendente cum Michaele et Gabriele Archangelis et Michael dicet etcetera Michael Svrgite All men Aryse venite Ad judicium Ffor now is sett þe hy? justyce And hath Assygnyd þe day of dom Rape ?ow redyly to þis grett Assyse bothe grett and small All An sum And of ?our Answere ?ow now Avyse What ?e xal sey whan þat ?e cum ?owre Ansuere ffor to telle Ffor whan þat god xal ?ow appose ther is non helpe of no glose the trewth fful trewlye he wyl tose And send ?ow to hevyn or helle. Gabryell Bothe pope prynce and prysste with crowne Kynge and caysere and knyhtys kene Rapely ?e renne ?our resonys to rowne Ffor this xal be þe day of tene Nowther pore ne ryche of grett renowne ne all þe develys in helle þat bene Ffrom þis day ?ow hyde not mowne Ffor all ?our dedys here xal be sene Opynly in Syght Who þat is fowndyn in deedly gylte he were bettyr to ben hylte in hendeles helle he xal be spylte his dedys his deth xal dyght. Omnes resurgentes subtus terram clamauit ha aa ha aa ha aa. Deinde surgentes dicat ha aa etcetera. Ha aa cleue a-sundyr ?e clowdys of clay A-sundyr ?e breke and lete vs pas now may oure songe be wele-Away þat evyr we synnyd in dedly trespas. Omnes demones clamant Harrow and owt what xal we say harrow we crye owt And Alas Alas harrow is þis þat day to endles peyne þat vs must pas Alas harrow and owt we crye Omnes anime resurgentes dicant etcetera A mercy lorde ffor oure mysdede And lett þi mercy sprynge and sprede but alas we byden in drede It is to late to Aske mercye. Deus Venite benedicti my bretheryn all Patris mei ?e childeryn dere Come hedyr to me to myn hy? hall All þo myn suterys and servauntys be All þo ffowle wyrmys ffrom ?ow ffalle With my ryght hand I blysse ?ow here my blyssynge burnyschith ?ow as bryght as berall As crystall clene it clensyth ?ow clere All ffylth ffrom ?ow ffade Petyr to hevyn ?atys þou wende and goo þe lokkys þou losyn and hem vndo my blyssyd childeryn þou brynge me to here hertys for to glade. Petrus The ?atys of hevyn I opyn þis tyde Now welcome dere bretheryn to hevyn i-wys Com on and sytt on goddys ryght syde Where myrthe and melody nevyr may mys. Omnes saluati On kne we crepe we gon we glyde to wurchepp oure lorde þat mercyfful is Ffor thorwe his woundys þat be so wyde he hath brought us to his blys holy lorde we wurcheppe þe. Deus Welcome ?e be in hevyn to sitt wel cum fro me xul ?e nevyr flitt so sekyr of blys ?e xul be ?itt to myrth and joye welcum ?e be. Anime dampnandum Ha Ha mercy mercy we crye and crave A mercy lorde for oure mysdede A mercy mercy we rubbe we rave A help us good lord in þis nede. Deus How wolde ?e wrecchis Any mercy haue Why Aske ?e mercy now in þis nede What haue ?e wrought ?our sowle to saue to whom haue ?e don Any mercyful dede Mercy for to wynne. Primus diabolus Mercy nay nay they xul haue wrake And þat on here fforehed wyttnes I take Ffor þer is wretyn with letteris blake Opynly all here synne. Deus To hungry and thrusty þat Askyd in my name mete and drynke wolde ?e ?eve non Of nakyd men had ?e no shame ?e wold nott vesyte men in no preson ?e had no pete on seke nor lame Dede of mercy wold ?e nevyr don Vn-herborwed men ?e servyd þe same to bery the deed pore man wold ?e not gon These dedys doth ?ow spylle ffor ?oure love was I rent on rode and for ?oure sake I shed my blode Whan I was so mercyfull and so gode Why haue ?e wrought a?ens my wylle. 2us diabolus I ffynde here wretyn in þin fforheed þou wore so stowte and sett in pryde þou woldyst not ?eve a pore man breed but ffrom þi dore þou woldyst hym chyde. 3us diabolus And in þi face here do I rede þat if a thrysty man com any tyde Ffor thrust þow he xulde be deed drynk ffrom hym þou woldyst evyr hyde On covetyse was all thy thought. 1us diabolus In wratth þi neybore to bakbyte them for to hangere was þi delyte þou were evyr redy them to endyte On þe seke man rewyst þou nought. 2us diabolus Evyr-mor on Envye was All þi mende þ[ou] woldyst nevyr vesyte no presoner to All þi neyborys þou were vnkende þou woldyst nevyr helpe man in daunger. 3us diabolus The synne of slauth þi sowle xal shende masse nore mateynes woldyst þou non here to bery þe deed man þou woldyst not wende. þerfore þou xalt to endles ffere to slowth þou were ful prest. ius diabolus Thou haddyst rejoyse in glotonye In dronkesheppe and in rebawdye Vnherborwyd with velonye þou puttyst from here rest. 2us diabolus Sybile sclutte þou ssalte sewe All ?our lyff was leccherous lay to all ?our neyborys ?e wore a shrewe all ?our plesauns was leccherous play Goddys men ?e lovyd but fewe nakyd men and ffebyl of array ?e wolde nott socowre with a lytel drewe nott with A thred þe soth to say Whan they Askyd in godys name. Omnes dampnandi A mercy lord mekyl of myght we Aske þi mercy and not þi ryght not after oure dede so us quyth we haue synnyd we be to blame. Deus
